businessRules.rule: set @BusinessRules_EnableResultSet = 1 -- Enable caching of the result set. Duration is specified in seconds. -- set @BusinessRules_ResultSetCacheDuration = 30

update.Script:
var id = (exec proc Get_AuditorId @BusinessRules_UserID)
exec View_Auditor id
var id = exec Get_AuditorId @BusinessRules_UserID if id is not null exec View_Auditor id
var id = exec Get_AuditorId @BusinessRules_UserID if id is not null select * from Auditor where AuditorId = id
int id = exec Get_AuditorId @BusinessRules_UserID if id is not null select * from Auditor where AuditorId = id
exec Get_AuditorId @BusinessRules_UserID
exec View_Auditor @BusinessRules_UserID
exec View_Auditor @BusinessRules_AuditorId
exec View_Auditor @BusinessRules_email
exec View_Auditor @BusinessRules_UserId

declare @id int = 0 set @id = exec View_Auditor @BusinessRules_UserId
if @id is not null exec Get_Auditor @id

declare @id int = 0 set @id = exec View_Auditor @BusinessRules_UserId
if @id is not null exec Get_Auditor @id

declare @id int = 0 set @id = Exec View_Auditor @BusinessRules_UserId
if @id is not null exec Get_Auditor @id
exec Get_AuditorId @BusinessRules_UserID

insert.Script:
if @CategoryPrefixNumber <> 0 and @ProjectPrefixNumber <> 0 set @NoRujukan = (select 'Audit' + '-' + Cast(@ProjectPrefixNumber as varchar ) + Cast(@CategoryPrefixNumber as varchar ) )
update Categories set PrefixNumber +=1 where Category = @Category
